question: What force can keep you going after you just lost the love of your life?
Do we have a country like Nigeria that just birthed six unicorns last year alone?
Do we have the African youth out there being so amazing and living their lives?
What makes you different from, let's say, even your cousin that couldn't, that is still home, trapped?
And do you think that's business friendly, or do you think it's cumbersome in business?
Then don't you think that we should make it easy, that we should have a friendly doing business environment?
When you look at all of those indexes and others, what do they have in common?
To this day, when they talk about the poverty of Africa, what do they talk about?
In the face of just like, you know, judgment or whatever, can you show up with empathy?
Do you, as you travel through this world, as you travel through America, feel the burn of hatred?
Do you think it's going to stop me from doing anything I have to do?
So in the morning I'm waking up, I'm just like, gee, can I get my tea?
But today we get triggers and we don't know what to do with it because where do we run to?
But how much how much progress have they made from the bottom to where they are now and keep going?
And so at some point, you just ask yourself, was my whole life built on a lie?
